about.title: Profile
about.body: Senior Software Engineer with experience across telecommunications, banking, insurance, transport, asset management, and pharmaceutical supply. Strong background in .NET, architecture, DevOps/DevSecOps, and enterprise integration.

seo.description: Mouadh Jaber — Software Engineer. .NET / C# / Microservices / DevOps. CV in English, French, and Arabic.
seo.keywords: Mouadh Jaber, Software Engineer, .NET, C#, Microservices, DevOps, DevSecOps, Azure, WCF, Web API
